metadata.name: Jerry Saltz Is An Asshat (Trash X Mondrian)
metadata.description:
"Art is for anyone. It just isn't for everyone." - Jerry Saltz  
>  
"Art is not made for anybody and is, at the same time, for everybody" - Piet Mondrian  
>  
'Jerry Saltz Is An Asshat' references a heated exchange with Jerry and his Twitter followers last year as his politically biased rhetoric intensified. I had mistakenly attempted to introduce nuance to the conversation... That story continues at https://anotherart.space/jerry-saltz-is-an-asshat/
